mapper.select:
select distinct n.*,
l.LookupValue as lookupValue, p.LookupValue as priority from memmembernotification n join utllookupvalue l ON n.NotificationType=l.LookupValueId join utllookup v ON l.LookupId=v.LookupId join utllookupvalue p ON n.Priority=p.LookupValueId join utllookup pl ON pl.LookupId=p.LookupId
where v.CategoryName='Notification Type' and l.LookupValueId=491 and
n.ForMemberRoleId=#{userMemberRoleId} order by n.ActivationDate ASC
